alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 11:13AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake affecting Caddo and De Soto Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wallace Lake to approach Action Pool stage of 149 feet late this evening. * WHERE...Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 149.0 feet, expect some minor lowland flooding with overflow beginning to affect some secondary roadways around the southern Kingston Road area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 148.0 feet. - Forecast...Given previous rainfall in the region, a crest of 149.7 feet is expected this evening. - Flood stage is 151.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CDT.
